name: sistema-tesis-classpad
description: Plataforma educativa multiplataforma similar a Google Classroom

scripts.deploy:web: cd web && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: cd functions && npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../functions && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Configura Firebase y ejecuta: npm run dev'
